name: Airnoria
description:
Year 2040. Airnoria. Small planet in outer space. Dangerous uninhabited place constantly showered with meteors.

Still combination of unique ores made Airnoria valuable target for mankind to settle colony. Big factories, mines, and living domes are much isolated, because of lava and tectonic plates activities. And because low atmosphere density all transfers are made with airships.

You are captain of such ship. Delivering everyone alive and cargo at least 90% safe is your guarantee. But you never now what dangers await you on the next flight. 

 

FEATURES

  • Free fly your airship across big open levels 
  • Complete freight jobs between 3 locations, earn credits and experience 
  • Pay attention to fuel usage, ship damage and cargo safety
  • Avoid meteors and lava lakes
  • Enjoy ambient sounds and music
  • Choose from camera presets or free camera

MISSION CONTROLS

arrows - steering
space - accelerate
v - reverse
c - camera position change
q - free camera mode (control with mouse) 
esc - menu/pause

REQUIREMENTS

WebGL2 enabled browser (best performance showed in Chrome)

NOTES

You can play the latest version on airnoria.com with progress saves
Saves are disabled on this page 
Fullscreen mode access via main menu or game menu
